children.text: Solution spaces help focus the work of innovation [and production of ideas -- Latin from Greek idea ‘form, pattern’, from the base of idein ‘to see’]

children.name: Engage
children.text: People and institutions are diverse. They have distinctive motivations, world views and ways of working. If they are to be involved in crafting solutions they must be engaged to do so
